Detailed Description

Transparent SPP Channel Class

This class provides a transparent SPP (Bluetooth Serial Port Profile) channel for iOS application that require to communicate with a Bluetooth device paired with the Companion.
This class inherits from ICISMPDeviceExtension that provides all the required methods to send data or text synchronously or asynchronously. Those include:

  • SendData
  • SendDataAsync
  • SendString
  • SendStringAsync

The data that the ICSPP object can be retrieved through the ICSPPDelegate property that conforms to the ICISMPDeviceExtensionDelegate protocol that provides the didReceiveDatafromICISMPDevice method for this purpose.

The initialization of the ICSPP channel can be achieved by following these steps:

  • Get the shared instance of ICSPP by calling sharedChannel - The returned object is autoreleased and needs to be retained
  • Assign the ICSPPDelegate property to the object that will receive the events of ICSPP
  • Check the isAvailable property to make sure the channel is ready - If the returned value is YES, the object is ready to send and receive data/text

Method Documentation

+ (ICSPP *) sharedChannel

Returns the unique shared instance of ICSPP.

The object returned by this method is autoreleased and must be retained to stay alive.

Returns
A pointer to the shared instance

Property Documentation

- (id<ICISMPDeviceDelegate, ICISMPDeviceExtensionDelegate>) delegate
readwritenonatomicassign

The delegate of an ICSPP object.

This property should be assigned the reference of a delegate object that will receive the events of ICSPP - This object should implement the ICISMPDeviceDelegate and ICISMPDeviceExtensionDelegate protocols
